original_text: “Give me your son,” Elijah replied. He took him from her arms, carried him to the upper room where he was staying, and laid him on his bed.
korean_text: 엘리야가 그에게 그의 아들을 달라 하여 그를 그 여인의 품에서 받아 안고 자기가 거처하는 다락에 올라가서 자기 침상에 누이고

sentences.original_text: He took him from her arms,
